Triceradon gets hit by Drillbit's gattleling gun bullets and the autoguns. Lucklely his iron hide prevented him from being seiriosly damaged. He runs for cover behind a rock. He then transforms and launches a gernade at Drillbit.

Triceradon calls into his com link." Stegoton! Ultracon! Dinotron! I need your help here. I'm near the Predacon base.
nbwrpg@egroups.com wrote:
>
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit was shocked by his enemys quickness. The horns didn't puncture
> him, but he was knocked back, hard. He didn't want to fight alone. He
> opened a comm-link.
> "All Predicons under Megatron, This is DrillBit. I am under Maximal
> attack, outfront the base." He says. He switches his drill, for his
> gattaling gun, and opens fire.
> 
> ::Pred Base::
> 
> The auto-guns lock on to the Maximal signature, and open fire.
>
